TopicTitle: Text not showing up in windows added by mods

Articles.Content: I added ScanSat and Kerbal Engineer Redux (as well as some others) and as you can see here [http://imgur.com/gallery/s8Tr4iJ/new](http://imgur.com/gallery/s8Tr4iJ/new) , none of the text is showing up when I open the windows related to these mods. All of the stock windows work, just not any that were added by the mods. Has anyone else had an issue like this? Someone over in the Reddit forums suggested it was because I didn't have the font 'Arial' but I pulled up Word and I have the font so it should work in KSP, no? Any other suggestions?![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)
